Title: Urban Terror: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Urban Terror, the worst
    of which allows for the remote execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: Urban Terror is a free multiplayer first person shooter developed by FrozenSand, that will run on any Quake III Arena compatible engine.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Urban Terror. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious server or leverage Man-in-the-Middle attacks to cause the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Urban Terror users should upgrade to the latest version:
